course.label: Morality, Methods, and Medicine: Formal and Philosophical Approaches to Health in Society

sectionText: In GCL 187, we will be exploring the ways that methodological and moral principles interact to informpolicy choices related to health and society. We will consider several topics of ethical and public policy concern, including abortion, experiments on animals, drug and medical device trials, organ donation, vaccination, and the provision of healthcare. We will be developing and critically reflecting on formal, quantitative tools relevant to investigating each topic we consider. Includes a group experiential project involving drafting health policies.
